website_summaries.verdict: This tin box of goodies is the perfect introduction for anyone curious about the long-standing Pokémon Trading Card Game after falling in love with the new Detective Pikachu film, as it includes many Pokémon creatures featured in the movie.
pros: Includes 7 4-card mini-packs from the Detective Pikachu series, 2 packs with 10 cards each, a Detective Pikachu pin, stickers, a notepad, and a stylish metal case
cons: While there are fewer cards in the Collector’s Chest than you may find in other sets, you also get limited-edition goodies based on the Detective Pikachu film

customer_reviews.title: Surprise maggot inside
customer_reviews.text: I opened up the box to a dead maggot inside that was still kinda fresh along with ants on it, some alive and some dead from being inside. This was really bizarre. I hope they are aware that some of their boxes may have maggots in them, and also that means wherever they are packing them, there are maggots. Very disgusting experience. I got some good pulls though from the pack, minus the maggot pull.
customer_reviews.author: Adriel Romo

customer_reviews.title: Great way to carry my decks from place to place
customer_reviews.text: This box fits about 6 boxes designed to hold 80 cards each, so about 500 cards depending on what you can fit in your box. It's high-quality, well-designed, and the accessories are a nice bonus: pin, pad of paper, and sticker sheet, all of a Detective Pikachu theme. The Detective Pikachu themed booster packs are 4 cards each, the rest are standard 10-card booster packs. This makes an excellent option for carrying your favorite decks, and is also big enough to carry a lunch or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged! 2 spots!! Unsure if it’s rewrapped or anything. Does not look right!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dented and damaged like crazy on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived dented to all heck. First I saw 2 small dents on the front top, not a huge deal. But then I saw the back and it had a huge dent in it and 1 smaller one. I mainly got this as a gift for our daughter to carry toys. Sucks it was so damaged. The photos are of dents on inside as they showed up better on camera. Overall it looks far worse in person and this is after I tried pushing them out to be less noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: 44 Year Old Male

customer_reviews.title: It's unique and very cool
customer_reviews.text: Big Pokemon fan for 20 years. Detective Pikachu is so unique, and I'm very happy that I purchased this tin. The packs of cards are so much fun to open, and I love all the contents inside.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Collector/Family Man
customer_reviews.text: I have recently rebooted myself in the Pokémon TCG. As a parent, I like to try to find hobbies that mix well with my daughter's interests. This collector's tin is perfect for adding to and containing her collection of cards. All cards in this set are holo, so they're a lot prettier than the average booster (at the expense of the number of cards per pack). This also came with a Pikachu themed notepad and stickers, which she loved. High value for someone who benefits from the added content. Not cost effective for someone trying to get the best bang for their buck on boosters, though.
customer_reviews.author: mbliss5339

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived bended in 3 places. No GX cards. Many double cards. Nothing special about this one. My kid was very disappointed! Whenever we ordered Pokémon’s from Amazon we regretted it. Always buy it from stores, even better if you have a specialized store in Pokémon cards and such.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Waldman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps My Kids Happy
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. My son uses the lunch box for his school lunches. The notepad is a nice touch and gets my kids to practice writing and drawing. The stickers are pretty good. I don't know how the rarity of the cards, but at least it keeps them interested.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Lots of Pokémon cards perfect for my collection the collectible lunch box is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Ritchie II

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift done right
customer_reviews.text: I have this to my grandson for a birthday gift. He was really excited! Their were some duplicate cards in there but when you're 7 years old that's no big deal. Glad I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Detective Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Was fun to open almost had all the cards in the collection and I love the collectable tin! The highlight of the tin for me was Mewtwo, Slaking and charizard.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Treloggen

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson for Christmas. He actually go two of these. He kept both of them. Love the metal container. He loved all the stuff inside. Made my gift giving easier.
customer_reviews.author: TocyRN

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good price for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it and it’s a pretty good value for the price. The lunch box is a little flimsy but not awful. He uses it to hold his cards though & not for a lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent J Cappuccio

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, out of all the Detective Pikachu cards, this one is the best one to buy. I collect the whole card set with this alone. The extra stuff is a bonus. For this price, worth it. I love them and I was able to collect the whole set thank you. Package came in perfect condition, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyZiemann

customer_reviews.title: This is cool!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool.. My oldest Nephew is going to love this Pokamon Treasure chest set.. I love it too. I may have to get me one. I'm a Big Pokamon fan too!

customer_reviews.title: Kinda flimsy lunchbox.
customer_reviews.text: The lunchbox is not a sturdy one. It’s actually kinda flimsy. Either way my daughter loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and well worth the cost

customer_reviews.title: Handle Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and everything was included and appeared to be in original seal. My only gripe is that the tin arrived with one part snapped off! Really annoying, should've picked this up at Gamestop I want there looking for other cards and saw all the tins were in perfect shape, made me jealous.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged lunch box!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed!!!!! The description of the item did not state it would have a dent. The outer cardboard box was fine and the packing would have not caused this. I was just sent something already damaged.

customer_reviews.title: Mewtwo!
customer_reviews.text: What a great tin! I opened it up on my YouTube channel and was fortunate enough to get a Mewtwo! Definitely recommend! Great value for all those holos!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift

customer_reviews.title: My son love it ! Especially the carrying box !

customer_reviews.author: reut

product_meta.title: Pokemon TCG: Detective Pikachu Collector Treasure Chest | 9 Booster Pack | A Collector's Pin | A Notepad & Sticker Sheet
product_meta.description: The pokémon detective pikachu movie is still on its way to theaters, but fans can get an early jump on the excitement by adding some super-sleuthing fun to their Pokémon Trading Card Game collection. The Pokémon TCG: detective pikachu collector chest is a great way to collect some of the new cards inspired by the movie. Included in this sturdy metal case are seven Pokémon TCG: detective pikachu four-card booster packs, along with two additional Pokémon TCG booster packs. The set also features a stylish pin, a sticker sheet, and a notepad—perfect for recording your game-winning strategies (or investigation notes)!
feature_bullets: 7 Pokémon TCG:  detective pikachu booster packs
A cool collector's pin inspired by detective Pikachu
A Pokémon notepad and sticker sheet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars462 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
